Name: 100,000 Steps
Description: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain # Fury. Can only occur once every # seconds.
DescriptionClean: When activating or refreshing the full Walking Arsenal Key Passive effect, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain Fury. Can only occur once every seconds.
Localisation: When activating or refreshing the full {c_important}Walking Arsenal{/c} Key Passive effect, you automatically cast {c_important}Ground Stomp{/c} and gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} Fury. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.

Name: Ahavarion, Spear of Lycander
Description: Gain a random Shrine effect for # seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Gain a random Shrine effect for seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every seconds.
Localisation: Gain a random Shrine effect for {c_number}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} seconds after killing an Elite enemy. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Name: Airidah's Inexorable Will
Description:
When casting an Ultimate Skill and again # seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal # Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by #% per # point of Willpower you have.

Current Bonus: #%
DescriptionClean: When casting an Ultimate Skill and again seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by per point of Willpower you have. Current Bonus:
Localisation:
When casting an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill and again {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds after, you Pull in Distant enemies and deal {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage to them. This damage is increased by {c_number}[(Affix_Value_2 * 100)|1%x|]{/c} per {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} point of Willpower you have.

Current Bonus: {c_number}[Floor(Owner.Willpower_Total) * (Affix_Value_2 * 100) / Affix."Static Value 2"|x%|]{/c}

Name: Ancients' Oath
Description: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take #% increased damage from you for # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Steel Grasp launches 2 additional chains. Enemies hit by Steel Grasp take increased damage from you for seconds.
Localisation: {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} launches {c_number}2{/c} additional chains. Enemies hit by {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} take {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage from you for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Name: Andariel's Visage
Description: Lucky Hit: Up to a #% chance to trigger a poison nova that applies # Poisoning damage over # seconds to enemies in the area.
DescriptionClean: Lucky Hit: Up to a chance to trigger a poison nova that applies Poisoning damage over seconds to enemies in the area.
Localisation: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to trigger a poison nova that applies {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Poisoning damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds to enemies in the area.

Name: Arreat's Bearing
Description:
Ancients you summon are empowered.

Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals # Physical damage over # seconds when he leaps.
Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal # damage while he whirlwinds.
Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional # damage over # seconds when he upheaves the ground.
DescriptionClean: Ancients you summon are empowered. Korlic creates an Earthquake that deals Physical damage over seconds when he leaps. Talic leaves behind Dust Devils that deal damage while he whirlwinds. Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional damage over seconds when he upheaves the ground.
Localisation:
Ancients you summon are empowered.

{icon:bullet}Korlic creates an {c_important}Earthquake{/c} that deals {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage over {c_number}[PowerTag.Barbarian_Earthquake."Script Formula 1"]{/c} seconds when he leaps.
{icon:bullet}Talic leaves behind {c_important}Dust Devils{/c} that deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (Affix_Value_1 * 2)]{/c} damage while he whirlwinds.
{icon:bullet}Mawdac ignites the ground Burning enemies for an additional {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (Affix_Value_1)]{/c} damage over {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds when he upheaves the ground.

Name: Asheara's Khanjar
Description: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by #% for # seconds, up to #%.
DescriptionClean: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by for seconds, up to.
Localisation: Hits with this weapon increase your Attack Speed by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|1%+|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|1%+|]{/c}.

Name: Axial Conduit
Description:
Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to # enemies. When it returns, it drains # Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After draining # total Mana, the bolt explodes for # Lightning Damage.
                       
Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
DescriptionClean: Chain Lightning alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to enemies. When it returns, it drains Mana from you for each active Chain Lightning. After draining total Mana, the bolt explodes for Lightning Damage.                         Chain Lightning expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.
Localisation:
{c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} alternates between orbiting you and seeking up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} enemies. When it returns, it drains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Mana from you for each active {c_important}Chain Lightning{/c}. After draining {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 3"]{/c} total Mana, the bolt explodes for {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1 * Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} Lightning Damage.
                       
{c_important}Chain Lightning{/c} expires if you don't have enough Mana for it to drain.

Name: Banished Lord's Talisman
Description: After you spend # of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal #% increased damage.
DescriptionClean: After you spend of your Primary Resource, your next Core Skill is guaranteed to Overpower. Your Critical Strikes that Overpower deal increased damage.
Localisation: After you spend {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} of your Primary Resource, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}. Your Critical Strikes that {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Name: Battle Trance
Description: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by #. While at maximum stacks, you deal  #% increased damage and your other Skills gain #% increased Attack Speed.
DescriptionClean: Increase Frenzy's maximum stacks by. While at maximum stacks, you deal  increased damage and your other Skills gain increased Attack Speed.
Localisation: Increase {c_important}Frenzy's{/c} maximum stacks by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c}. While at maximum stacks, you deal  {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage and your other Skills gain {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%+|]{/c} increased Attack Speed.

Name: Beastfall Boots
Description:
When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill consumes all of your Energy and deals #% increased damage per Energy consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores # Energy.
DescriptionClean: When you cast an Ultimate Skill, your next Core Skill consumes all of your Energy and deals increased damage per Energy consumed. Using a Cooldown restores Energy.
Localisation:
When you cast an {c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill, your next {c_important}Core{/c} Skill consumes all of your Energy and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|2%x|]{/c} increased damage per Energy consumed.

Using a Cooldown restores {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Energy.

Name: Björnfang's Tusks (Not used, we reuse for future!)
Description:
Cataclysm's lightning strikes now prioritize enemies.

While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal #% increased damage.
DescriptionClean: Cataclysm's lightning strikes now prioritize enemies. While Cataclysm is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal increased damage.
Localisation:
{c_important}Cataclysm{/c}'s lightning strikes now prioritize enemies.

While {c_important}Cataclysm{/c} is active, you gain unlimited Spirit and deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Name: Black River
Description: Corpse Explosion consumes up to # additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining #% damage and #% Size per additional Corpse consumed.
DescriptionClean: Corpse Explosion consumes up to additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining damage and Size per additional Corpse consumed.
Localisation: {c_important}Corpse Explosion{/c} consumes up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional Corpses around the initial Corpse, gaining {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} damage and {c_random}[Affix_Value_2/2|1%|]{/c} Size per additional Corpse consumed.

Name: Blood Artisan's Cuirass
Description: When you pick up # Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
DescriptionClean: When you pick up Blood Orbs, a free Bone Spirit is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.
Localisation: When you pick up {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} {c_important}{u}Blood Orbs{/u}{/c}, a free {c_important}Bone Spirit{/c} is spawned, dealing bonus damage based on your current Life percent.

Name: Blood Moon Breeches
Description:
Your Minions' attacks have a #% chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden.  

You deal #% increased Overpower damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
DescriptionClean: Your Minions' attacks have a chance to randomly inflict Decrepify or Iron Maiden.  You deal increased Overpower damage to enemies affected by your Curses.
Localisation:
Your Minions' attacks have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%|]{/c} chance to randomly inflict {c_important}Decrepify{/c} or {c_important}Iron Maiden{/c}.  

You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} increased {c_important}Overpower{/c} damage to enemies affected by your {c_important}Curses{/c}.

Name: Bloodless Scream
Description:
Your Darkness Skills Chill enemies for up to #% and deal #% increased damage to Frozen enemies.

Lucky Hit: Your Darkness Skills have up to a #% chance to generate # additional Essence against Frozen targets.

{c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your {c_important}Darkness{/c} Skills have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c} chance to generate {c_random}[Affix_Value_1]{/c} additional Essence against {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c} targets.

Name: Blue Rose
Description: Lucky Hit: Up to a #% chance to form an exploding Ice Spike, dealing # Cold damage. Triple this chance if the enemy is Frozen.

Triple this chance if the enemy is {c_important}{u}Frozen{/u}{/c}.

Name: Condemnation
Description: Your Core Skills deal #% increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Basic Skills using this weapon have a #% chance to generate 3 Combo Points.
DescriptionClean: Your Core Skills deal increased damage when spending 3 Combo Points. Your Basic Skills using this weapon have a chance to generate 3 Combo Points.

Description: You gain #% increased Lucky Hit Chance against Crowd Controlled enemies.

Name: Cruor's Embrace

DescriptionClean: Casting Blood Surge consumes nearby Corpses to cause mini novas, dealing damage. This damage is increased by for each enemy drained by your initial cast, up to , as well as by for each Corpse consumed.

Name: Deathless Visage
Description:
Bone Spear leaves behind echoes that explode for # Physical damage, increased by #% for every #% Critical Strike Damage you have.

Current Bonus: #%

Localisation:

Damage is increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} per target drained by the initial cast, up to {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%|]{/c}.

Name: Dolmen Stone
Description:
Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active causes the Boulder to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by #% for each one currently rotating.

You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.
DescriptionClean: Casting Boulder while Hurricane is active causes the Boulder to rotate around you instead. Boulder's damage is increased by for each one currently rotating. You may have up to 10 Boulders active at a time.

Casting {c_important}Boulder{/c} while {c_important}Hurricane{/c} is active causes the {c_important}Boulder{/c} to rotate around you instead. {c_important}Boulder's{/c} damage is increased by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%x|]{/c} for each one currently rotating.

You may have up to {c_number}10{/c} {c_important}Boulders{/c} active at a time.

Name: Doombringer
Description: Lucky Hit: Up to a #% chance to deal # Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by #% for # seconds.

Localisation: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Up to a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal {c_number}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Shadow damage to surrounding enemies and reduce their damage dealt by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds.

Penetrating Shot makes enemies Vulnerable for # seconds. 

Every #th cast of Penetrating Shot bounces off walls and deals #% more damage.

Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]th{/c} cast of {c_important}Penetrating Shot{/c} bounces off walls and deals {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} more damage.

Name: Earthbreaker

Casts of Landslide leave behind Tectonic Spikes that deal # Physical damage over # seconds.

Spawning a Landslide pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a #% chance to spawn two instead.

Spawning a {c_important}Landslide{/c} pillar within Tectonic Spikes has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2 * 100|%|]{/c} chance to spawn two instead.

Upon collecting Crackling Energy, there's a #% chance to release a lightning nova, dealing # Lightning damage, increased by #% for every # Intelligence you have.

Name: Godslayer Crown
Description:
When you Stun, Freeze, or Immobilize an Elite, you Pull In all Nearby enemies and deal #% increased damage to them for # seconds. Can only occur once every # seconds.

Against Bosses, this effect triggers when dealing damage instead.

Name: Gohr's Devastating Grips

Name: The Oculus
Description: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment you are taken to a random location.
DescriptionClean: Gain the effect of the Teleport Enchantment for free. When you Evade using Teleport Enchantment you are taken to a random location.
Localisation: Gain the effect of the {c_important}Teleport Enchantment{/c} for free. When you Evade using {c_important}Teleport Enchantment{/c} you are taken to a random location.

Name: Tibault's Will
Description: You deal #% increased damage while Unstoppable and for # seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain # of your Primary Resource.
DescriptionClean: You deal increased damage while Unstoppable and for seconds after. When you become Unstoppable, gain of your Primary Resource.
Localisation: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage while {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c} and for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds after. When you become {c_important}{u}Unstoppable{/u}{/c}, gain {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} of your Primary Resource.

Name: Tuskhelm of Joritz the Mighty
Description: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you have a #% chance to become more enraged granting #% increased damage, # Fury per second, and #% Cooldown Reduction.
DescriptionClean: When you gain Berserking while already Berserk, you have a chance to become more enraged granting increased damage, Fury per second, and Cooldown Reduction.
Localisation: When you gain {c_important}{u}Berserking{/u}{/c} while already {c_important}{u}Berserk{/u}{/c}, you have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%|]{/c} chance to become more enraged granting {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_0"|%x|]{/c} increased damage, {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_1"]{/c} Fury per second, and {c_number}[Affix."Static_Value_2"|%|]{/c} Cooldown Reduction.

Name: Twin Strikes
Description: After casting Double Swing # times, your next Double Swing will hit # additional times, each dealing #% increased damage.
DescriptionClean: After casting Double Swing times, your next Double Swing will hit additional times, each dealing increased damage.
Localisation: After casting {c_important}Double Swing{/c} {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0" - 1]{/c} times, your next {c_important}Double Swing{/c} will hit {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} additional times, each dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased damage.

Name: Tyrael's Might
Description: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing # damage.
DescriptionClean: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing damage.
Localisation: While at full Life, your Skills unleash a divine barrage dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage.

Name: Unbroken Chain
Description:
Casting Steel Grasp reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by # seconds. 

Enemies damaged by Iron Maelstrom deal #% less damage for # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Casting Steel Grasp reduces Iron Maelstrom's Cooldown by seconds.  Enemies damaged by Iron Maelstrom deal less damage for seconds.
Localisation:
Casting {c_important}Steel Grasp{/c} reduces {c_important}Iron Maelstrom's{/c} Cooldown by {c_random}[Affix_Value_1/3|1|]{/c} seconds. 

Enemies damaged by {c_important}Iron Maelstrom{/c} deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} less damage for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds.

Name: Unsung Ascetic's Wraps
Description:
Lightning Storm gains # additional strike each times it grows.

Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing #% increased damage.
DescriptionClean: Lightning Storm gains additional strike each times it grows. Lightning Storm Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing increased damage.
Localisation:
{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} gains {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} additional strike each times it grows.

{c_important}Lightning Storm{/c} Critical Strikes cause lightning to strike twice, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|x%|]{/c} increased damage.

Name: Vasily's Prayer
Description: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for #% of your Maximum Health.
DescriptionClean: Your Earth Skills are now also Werebear Skills and Fortify you for of your Maximum Health.
Localisation: Your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills are now also {c_important}Werebear{/c} Skills and {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} you for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1*100|1%|]{/c} of your Maximum Health.

Name: Vox Omnium
Description: Casting a Core Skill additionally fires 2 instances of Fire Bolt, Frost Bolt, or Spark, matching the elements of your last 2 non-Core Skill casts. These projectiles deal #% increased damage.
DescriptionClean: Casting a Core Skill additionally fires 2 instances of Fire Bolt, Frost Bolt, or Spark, matching the elements of your last 2 non-Core Skill casts. These projectiles deal increased damage.
Localisation: Casting a {c_important}Core{/c} Skill additionally fires {c_number}2{/c} instances of {c_important}Fire Bolt{/c}, {c_important}Frost Bolt{/c}, or {c_important}Spark{/c}, matching the elements of your last {c_number}2{/c} non-{c_important}Core{/c} Skill casts. These projectiles deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|x%|]{/c} increased damage.

Name: Waxing Gibbous
Description: Killing an enemy with Shred grants Stealth for # seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Killing an enemy with Shred grants Stealth for seconds. Breaking Stealth with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for seconds.
Localisation: Killing an enemy with {c_important}Shred{/c} grants {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. Breaking {c_important}{u}Stealth{/u}{/c} with an attack grants guaranteed Critical Strikes for {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1|]{/c} seconds.

Name: Wildheart Hunger
Description: When you Shapeshift into a Werewolf or a Werebear, you gain Wildheart for # seconds. Wildheart grants you #% stacking damage every # seconds, up to #%.
DescriptionClean: When you Shapeshift into a Werewolf or a Werebear, you gain Wildheart for seconds. Wildheart grants you stacking damage every seconds, up to.
Localisation: When you Shapeshift into a Werewolf or a Werebear, you gain Wildheart for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Wildheart grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} stacking damage every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1|1|"]{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[(Affix_Value_1*Affix."Static Value 2")|1%x|]{/c}.

Name: Windforce
Description: Hits of Barrage have a #% chance to deal double damage and Knock Down enemies.
DescriptionClean: Hits of Barrage have a chance to deal double damage and Knock Down enemies.
Localisation: Hits of {c_important}Barrage{/c} have a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to deal double damage and Knock Down enemies.

Name: Word of Hakan
Description: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements and receives your Arrow Storm benefits.
DescriptionClean: Your Rain of Arrows is always Imbued with all Imbuements and receives your Arrow Storm benefits.
Localisation: Your {c_important}Rain of Arrows{/c} is always {c_important}Imbued{/c} with all {c_important}Imbuements{/c} and receives your {c_important}Arrow Storm{/c} benefits.

Name: Writhing Band of Trickery
Description:
Casting a Subterfuge Skill leaves behind a Decoy Trap that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. After # seconds, it explodes, dealing # Shadow damage. 

This effect is treated as a Trap Skill and can only spawn one Decoy Trap every # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Casting a Subterfuge Skill leaves behind a Decoy Trap that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. After seconds, it explodes, dealing Shadow damage.  This effect is treated as a Trap Skill and can only spawn one Decoy Trap every seconds.
Localisation:
Casting a {c_important}Subterfuge{/c} Skill leaves behind a {c_important}Decoy Trap{/c} that continuously Taunts and lures enemies. After {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, it explodes, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Shadow damage. 

This effect is treated as a {c_important}Trap{/c} Skill and can only spawn one {c_important}Decoy Trap{/c} every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.

Name: X'Fal's Corroded Signet
Description: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a #% chance to erupt, dealing # damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.
DescriptionClean: Lucky Hit: Your damage over time effects have up to a chance to erupt, dealing damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.
Localisation: {c_label}Lucky Hit:{/c} Your damage over time effects have up to a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to erupt, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * (1 + Owner.Main_Hand_Damage_Percent_Bonus) * Affix_Value_1]{/c} damage of the same type to surrounding enemies.

Name: Yen's Blessing
Description: Casting a Skill has a #% chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every # seconds.
DescriptionClean: Casting a Skill has a chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every seconds.
Localisation: Casting a Skill has a {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%|]{/c} chance to cast a Non-{c_important}Mobility{/c}, Non-{c_important}Ultimate{/c} Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds.
